languages.text: {n}Кунрад Войгтвир отчетливо виден вам в сумраке мостика. В его руке вы замечаете осколок лезвия: темные капли на металле, кажется, переливаются перламутром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кунрад Войгтвир отчетливо виден вам в сумраке мостика. В его руке вы замечаете уже знакомый вам осколок лезвия: темные капли на металле, кажется, переливаются перламутром.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кунрад Войгтвир отчетливо виден вам в сумраке мостика. В его руке вы замечаете осколок лезвия: темные капли на металле, кажется, переливаются перламутром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. He is holding the now-familiar familiar broken blade stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}
{n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. He is holding the now-familiar familiar broken blade stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}
{n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. He is holding the now-familiar familiar broken blade stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

{n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你清楚地看到昆拉德·维特威尔站在舰桥阴暗的地方。他手里拿着一把破碎的利刃，上面沾着黑色的液体，似乎泛着珍珠般的光泽。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你清楚地看到昆拉德·维特威尔站在舰桥阴暗的地方。他手里拿着那把你已经见过一次的短刀，上面沾着黑色的液体，似乎泛着珍珠般的光泽。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes ver con claridad a Kunrad Voigtvir en la penumbra del puente. Sostiene en sus manos una espada rota, manchada de gotas oscuras que parecen emitir un resplandor perlado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes ver con claridad a Kunrad Voigtvir en la penumbra del puente. En sus manos sostiene la ya familiar espada rota, manchada de gotas oscuras que parecen emitir un resplandor perlado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブリッジの薄暗い中にクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの姿がはっきりと見える。彼が持つ折れた刃は、真珠のような輝きを放つ黒い雫で汚れている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}橋の薄暗い中にクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの姿がはっきりと見える。彼は、今では見慣れた折れた刀を持っている。真珠のような輝きに見える黒い滴で汚れた刀だ。{/n}
{n}ブリッジの薄暗い中にクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの姿がはっきりと見える。彼が持つ折れた刃は、真珠のような輝きを放つ黒い雫で汚れている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez distinctement Kunrad Voigtvir dans l'obscurité de la passerelle. La lame brisée qu'il tient entre ses mains est tachée de gouttes sombres qui semblent scintiller d'un éclat nacré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez distinctement Kunrad Voigtvir dans l'obscurité de la passerelle. Il tient entre ses mains la fameuse lame brisée, tachée de gouttes sombres qui semblent scintiller d'un éclat nacré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kannst Kunrad Voigtvir im Zwielicht der Brücke deutlich erkennen. Die zerbrochene Klinge in seiner Hand ist mit dunklen Tropfen befleckt, die einen perlenartigen Schimmer aufzuweisen scheinen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst Kunrad Voigtvir im Zwielicht der Brücke deutlich erkennen. In Händen hält er die nunmehr vertraute zerbrochene Klinge, befleckt mit dunklen Tropfen, die einen perlenartigen Schimmer aufzuweisen scheinen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köprünün loşluğunda Kunrad Voigtvir'i net şekilde görebiliyorsun. Elinde tuttuğu bıçak, incimsi bir ışıltıyla parlıyor gibi duran koyu damlalarla lekelenmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see Kunrad Voigtvir clearly in the gloom of the bridge. The broken blade he is holding is stained with dark drops that seem to have a pearlescent glimmer to them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Köprünün loşluğunda Kunrad Voigtvir'i net şekilde görebiliyorsun. Elinde tuttuğu bıçak, incimsi bir ışıltıyla parlıyor gibi duran koyu damlalarla lekelenmiş.{/n}
